description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter & Jelly Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut Butter & Jelly Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Spray 3 x 20cm round cake pans with oil and line bases with baking paper.

Place butter, sugar and jelly crystals, reserving 1 tbs, in a bowl. Beat with an electric mixer for 5 minutes or until pale and creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating for 1 minute between each addition. Add flour, baking powder and milk, in 2 batches, and mix until just combined. Divide mixture evenly among pans and smooth surface. Bake for 50 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centres comes out clean. Cool in pans for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely. Trim tops to level cakes.

Meanwhile, to make the peanut butter buttercream, whip butter for 3-5 minutes or until pale and creamy. Scrape down side of bowl. Add icing sugar and milk and whip for a further 5 minutes or until fluffy. Add peanut butter and beat until just combined.

Place a little buttercream on a cake board and place one cake on top. Using half the buttercream, spread over each cake layer and stack. Transfer remaining buttercream to a piping bag fitted with a star piping tip.

To make the strawberry jelly frosting, place jelly crystals in a small bowl, add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir to dissolve. Cool. Whip butter in a separate bowl for 3-5 minutes or until pale and creamy. Scrape down side of bowl. Add icing sugar and whip for 5 minutes or until fluffy. Slowly add jelly mixture and whisk until thick and smooth. Chill for 1 hour or until thick.
Apply frosting to top and side of cake and smooth. Pipe buttercream swirls around top edge of cake, scatter over some nuts and reserved jelly crystals, and pat remaining nuts on side of cake.
